name: Escape From Crimson Manor Ep.2
description:
In Escape from Crimson Manor Act 1 - Family Secrets - you will experience a “Penny Dreadful” like story set in a beautiful and enigmatic Victorian era manor with a dark secret.

Unravel The Mystery
After working many years as the science teacher in the prestigious St West School in London, the father of some of your students the enigmatic railroad magnate Hadley Strange wants to appoint you as the private institutor on his manor a luxurious property on the outskirts of London. Upon your arrival to the mansion, you find an envelope with your name containing a letter bearing a cryptic set of instructions that might change your mind about what your new employer really wants.


Delve Into The Manor
Explore a beautiful Victorian Mansion filled with fine art, and mysterious mechanical contraptions that will reveal to you even the most intimate aspects of the life of its residents. Decipher curious locks and find key items and objects that will help you make your way through the manor family ward in a nonlinear way, each room has a unique beauty and new pieces that will help you unveil the dark secret kept by the residence.


Solve The Puzzles
Solve clever riddles and fascinating mechanical puzzles crafted to ensure that only the right person could unveil the mansion's secret. Look for clues and take a closer look to your surroundings to discover the shocking truth about the mansion and it's mysterious residents. Find items and manage your inventory to make your way through the different passages of the mansion, examine many detailed items and discover how to use them to unlock all the rooms and get all the pieces to solve the manor puzzling secret, one so shocking that will leave you breathless.
